description: A platform for online trading of agricultural commodities.
eligibility: Farmers and traders across the country.

description: A credit card to provide farmers with easy access to short-term loans.
eligibility: Farmers who need credit facilities for agricultural activities.

description: A scheme to enhance soil health and productivity by providing soil health cards.
eligibility: Farmers in rural areas with poor soil health.

description: A scheme to promote irrigation systems in farms and ensure water use efficiency.
eligibility: Farmers who need irrigation systems for water management.

description: A scheme aimed at increasing agricultural production and improving rural infrastructure.
A scheme for sustainable groundwater management and water conservation.
A scheme to promote organic farming through training and financial assistance.
eligibility: Farmers interested in converting to organic farming practices.

schemeName: Mission for Integrated Development of Horticulture
description: A scheme to promote the development of horticulture in the country.

schemeName: National Mission on Agricultural Extension and Technology
description: A scheme to support agricultural extension activities and promote new technologies.
eligibility: Farmers in need of technology-driven farming solutions.

schemeName: Fisheries and Aquaculture Infrastructure Development Fund
description: A scheme to improve fisheries infrastructure and provide financial assistance for fisheries development.
eligibility: Fisheries and aquaculture farmers looking to improve infrastructure.

description: A scheme for farmers to get reliable electricity for irrigation purposes.
eligibility: Farmers requiring consistent electricity supply for irrigation.

description: A scheme for financial assistance to farmers.
eligibility: Farmers with less than 2 hectares of land

description: A crop insurance scheme for farmers.
eligibility: Farmers growing wheat for commercial purposes
